meta.name: Email to Notion Knowledge Base with IMAP, Postgres Dedup and Telegram Alert

parameters.content:
0) Create Postgres Table (run once)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS email_kb_index (
  message_id     TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
  slug           TEXT,
  created_at     TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT now(),
  notion_page_id TEXT
);

1) IMAP Email (Trigger)

Options → customEmailConfig: ["UNSEEN"]

(Gmail) Host: imap.gmail.com, Port: 993, SSL/TLS.

Key output fields: subject, textHtml/textPlain/html, date, messageId, from.

2) Function (Normalize)

Convert HTML → plain text (fallback to textPlain).

Output fields:

title, snippet(≤260), bodyText, slug (lowercase, spaces→-, remove non [a-z0-9-])

messageId (use header, fallback hash title+sentAt)

sentAt (ISO), fromAddress, sourceUrl (first URL in body)

3) Postgres (Execute Query) — Check Duplicate

Safe query that always returns output:

SELECT EXISTS(
  SELECT 1
  FROM email_kb_index
  WHERE message_id = $1
) AS exists;


Query Parameters: $1 = ={{ $json.messageId }}

 5. IF — Only Continue if New

Condition: Left ={{ $json.exists }} equals false

True → continue

False → stop/log (duplicate)
